segments.text: Excuse me , sir . Didn't you see the red light ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I thought I could make a right turn on red here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , sir . The sign says no turn on red .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I guess I didn't see it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry , sir , but may I see your driver's licence and insurance policy , please ? I have to give you a ticket .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sign here , please . You can appeal to the court within 14 days . This slip has all the information you need . Please drive safely , sir .
segments.speaker: S1
